pullRequest.title: Support cast function in SQL
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue #, if available: #915
Description of changes:

Implement cast function in SQL.
Update cast function doc. https://github.com/penghuo/sql/blob/support-cast/docs/user/dql/functions.rst#cast

nodes.bodyText: Just curious, without this new node, can we handle all overloading signatures of CAST function in function repository?
